resource_type.description: Type of the resource for the attachment

resource_subtype.description: Subtype of the resource type for the attachment

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the attachment was created

host.description: Information about the server hosting the attachment

parent.description: Information about the parent object to which the attachment belongs

gid.description: Unique identifier of the parent object

resource_type.description: Type of the resource for the parent object

resource_subtype.description: Subtype of the resource type for the parent object

created_by.description: Details of the user who created the parent object

gid.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the parent object

resource_type.description: Type of the resource for the user who created the parent object

size.description: Size of the attachment in bytes

connected_to_app.description: Details about the application to which the attachment is connected
